exploreProductsCollections.name: Fee payments
exploreProductsCollections.title: Fee payments & auto-reconciliations
exploreProductsCollections.subTitle: Collect and pay fees efficiently.
exploreProductsCollections.content: A powerful, yet easy-to-use school payment management solution to transform how you collect and manage any type of fee payments.

productData.title: Fee payments and auto-reconciliation software
productData.description: A powerful, easy-to-use school financial management solution to transform how you collect and manage any type of school fee payments.

productFeatures.name: Auto reconcile
productFeatures.subTitle: Automatic reconciliation of transactions
productFeatures.summary: Effortlessly reconcile your school financial transactions. Our platform automatically captures and categorizes transactions in real-time.

productFeatures.summary: Gain deep insights into your school's financial health through our comprehensive reporting tools.

productFeatures.summary: Access your dashboard securely from anywhere and on any device
